TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(object sender, AccessKeyPressedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AccessKeyPressedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AccessKeyPressedEventArgs)
public delegate void AccessKeyPressedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AccessKeyPressedEventArgs ^ e);
type AccessKeyPressedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AccessKeyPressedEventArgs -> unit

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序所附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示将处理 附加事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]的访问密钥由管理器类处理, 该管理器类的作用类似于访问密钥的服务, 并将访问[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]密钥输入转发到输入系统。Access keys in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] are handled by a manager class that acts somewhat like a service for access keys, and forwards access key input to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] input system. 通过在特定对象上附加附加事件的处理程序, 你可以将访问键与特定命令相关联, 而不是专门处理访问键按下事件, 而不是通过命令绑定来关联访问键, 然后通过相应的路由事件处理路由命令。Rather than handling access key pressed events specifically by attaching a handler for the attached event on a specific object, it is generally a better practice to associate the access key with a particular command through a command binding, and then handle the routed commands through the corresponding routed events. 此方法为用户输入提供统一的事件系统, 而不考虑输入模式启动输入的方式。This technique provides a unified event system for user input regardless of what input mode initiated the input. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
